Configuration.title: Configuration Error
Configuration.message: There was an issue with the server configuration. Please check the server settings.

AccessDenied.title: Access Denied
AccessDenied.message: Your email address does not match the corporate address of the company. If you believe you need to log in with this address, please wait until it is activated.

Verification.title: Verification Error
Verification.message: There was a problem with verification. The authorization token has expired or has already been used.

Default.title: Unknown Error
Default.message: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.

Unauthorized.contactAdmin: If the issue persists, please contact the administrator.

tooltip.limits: Typical starting limit: 50,000 emails per 24 hours as per AWS SES

tooltip.description: Schedule and automate tweets to engage with your audience and promote your content.
tooltip.price: Free tier available. 2,400 tweets per account per day (including retweets), with further limits on half-hour intervals to prevent spam (these are Twitter/X’s official limits, regardless of the tool used).

initialForm.tooltipIncludeFields: Include these fields in square brackets:
